dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for various computer vision tasks, including object detection, instance segmentation, and image captioning, containing 83k training images, 40k validation images, and 81k test images, with each image associated with five captions.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset to evaluate the interactions between objects in images, containing 108k images with densely annotated objects, attributes, and relationships.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome
